== The "Deshi" Local Community Team ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:left ; margin: 2em 2em 2em 2em; padding: 0.5em;"><nowiki>[[File:logo.png]]</nowiki>

Welcome to our Bangladeshi Ubuntu community.

This is the Ubuntu wiki home page for the Bangladeshi Ubuntu Local Community Team. The Bangladeshi team focuses on the computer users from schools, business and home users to encourage using Ubuntu for building a strong and effective Ubuntu user community in Bangladesh. We also maintain distributing and demonstrating Ubuntu within Bangladesh. Are you a Bangladeshi Ubuntu (or Kubuntu or Xubutu or Lubuntu) user, developer, translator, or a volunteer? Do you want to meet other Ubuntu users in Bangladesh who believes in the spirit of Ubuntu? If yes, then <nowiki>[[BangladeshiTeam-Membership|join the team]]</nowiki>.

=== Team Events ===

* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-bd|Upcoming Events]]</nowiki> - a list of upcoming events hosted on the loco.ubuntu.com site team page.
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-bd/events/history|Previous Events]]</nowiki> - an archive of details about past meetings.
* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/ubuntu-bd/rss/|RSS Feed]]</nowiki> - this is a link to a feed you can add to your favourite RSS Reader to keep up to date with upcoming team events.

=== IRC ===
Use the channel <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net:8001-#ubuntu-bd|#ubuntu-bd]]</nowiki> on irc.freenode.net:8001 or <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-bd/|Webchat]]</nowiki> in your browser! If you prefer to use a chat program then you can use <nowiki>[[http://xchat.org/|XChat]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.pidgin.im/|Pidgin]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://live.gnome.org/Empathy|Empathy]]</nowiki>. Full details can be found at <nowiki>[[BangladeshiTeam-IRC|IRC]]</nowiki>.
